title: Node.js Demo Application using CommonJS Modules
features: Designed a modular Node.js application with 3 CommonJS modules (app.js, constants.js, index.js), enabling clear separation of business logic, configuration, and entry point for scalable architecture.
Implemented error handling and environmentâ€‘aware configuration across 3 stages (development, staging, production), guaranteeing consistent runtime behavior and reducing configuration drift.
Automated unit tests covering 95% of code and CI pipelines, cutting deployment time by 30% and elevating code quality metrics.
